title: Fact Check: BJP veteran L.K. Advani’s daughter Pratibha is not joining the Congress Party | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A post has gone viral on social media claiming that Former Home Minister Lal Krishna Advani’s daughter, Pratibha Advani has joined the Congress Party.

Similar posts claiming that Pratibha Advani has joined Congress Party were found on Twitter as well.



 Other social media posts can be seen here, here, here, here, here and here.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and found it to be FAKE.

We Google searched the above social media claims and did not find anything related to this news.

Further, NewsMobile made a call to Lal Krishna Advani’s office. From there we got a confirmation that L.K. Advani’s daughter is not joining the Congress Party. The social media claims are FAKE.

In conclusion, these social media posts are FAKE.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
